Publications

Bridging the Treatment Gap: A Novel LLM-Driven System for Scalable Initial Patient Assessments in Mental Healthcare

Niclas Rosteck, Julian Lars Striegl, Claudia Loitsch
CHI Yokohama, 2025

To aid the widening treatment gap in psychotherapy, we designed, developed and evaluated a conversational agent-driven system to perform initial patient assessments remotely and autonomously.
